rev.desc.rev.desc: the unload/export icon was unseen in koren language, it is localization issue.
SCR 42063 Handle SQL mapping as part of the unload
Now handle keys as part of the unload
Removed obsolete panel funload
On the unload.a panel, localized the "unload/export" label.

Modified map.increase.cntr so that after unloading a single record, it won't proceed with the next one in the QBE unless it's a mass unload ($db.rec1=false). Updated map.check.done so that $db.rec1 doesn't get reset to false during data map processing.
Enabled -1 gui() option on unload.0 so Gfile widget would work.
debug only, no changes.

Took out the variables $db.ldopt.create and $db.recopt.update in panels unload.a and set.parms since they are no longer needed. Formats dbunload.prompt.* have been changed to use $db.ldopt and $db.recopt
Case insensitivity problem fixes.
Changed form displayed for unload to be the same as the one for RAD unloads. It is much more informative about options selected on the form.
added parameter and code flow to enable command line execution of an unload.
Added "or ($db.unlfmt="export" and option()=7) to the end of the condition for export.new to cause call for scheduled formatted text export.
Changed condition for exit in database.unload on panel unload.check.1 for schedule exit to be option()=7 and $db.unlfmt~="export" and for exit to export to be $db.unlfmt="export" or option()=7.
Corrected type on panel set.flags. The 3 line on code on the process panel in the "then" portion of the "if" statement is missing a "$" sign on one of the variables.
Converted to use scmsg().
Added reset of $bypass.unload.screen.flag when using the $abort exit.
Added nullsub to $bypass.unload.screen flag.
Still more text/gui bugs
Had a bug in text mode background unloads.
Pulled out a call to getnumb
Didn't set flags properly for background unloads. As a consequence, everything would get unloaded in the default e.g. binary format

descript.descript: the unload/export icon was unseen in koren language, it is localization issue.
SCR 42063 Handle SQL mapping as part of the unload
Now handle keys as part of the unloadRemoved obsolete panel funload
On the unload.a panel, localized the "unload/export" label.

Modified map.increase.cntr so that after unloading a single record, it won't proceed with the next one in the QBE unless it's a mass unload ($db.rec1=false). Updated map.check.done so that $db.rec1 doesn't get reset to false during data map processing.
Enabled -1 gui() option on unload.0 so Gfile widget would work.
debug only, no changes.

Took out the variables $db.ldopt.create and $db.recopt.update in panels unload.a and set.parms since they are no longer needed. Formats dbunload.prompt.* have been changed to use $db.ldopt and $db.recopt
Case insensitivity problem fixes.
Changed form displayed for unload to be the same as the one for RAD unloads. It is much more informative about options selected on the form.
added parameter and code flow to enable command line execution of an unload.
Added "or ($db.unlfmt="export" and option()=7) to the end of the condition for export.new to cause call for scheduled formatted text export.
Changed condition for exit in database.unload on panel unload.check.1 for schedule exit to be option()=7 and $db.unlfmt~="export" and for exit to export to be $db.unlfmt="export" or option()=7.
Corrected type on panel set.flags. The 3 line on code on the process panel in the "then" portion of the "if" statement is missing a "$" sign on one of the variables.
Converted to use scmsg().
Added reset of $bypass.unload.screen.flag when using the $abort exit.
Added nullsub to $bypass.unload.screen flag.
Still more text/gui bugs
Had a bug in text mode background unloads.
Pulled out a call to getnumb
Didn't set flags properly for background unloads. As a consequence, everything would get unloaded in the default e.g. binary format
